testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0001. Users should be able to add pipeline sources with the PowerShell step by providing name field, type field and onExecute field under the execution section. Then Pipeline sync should success.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0001. Users should be able to add pipeline sources with the PowerShell step by providing name field, type field and onExecute field under the execution section. Then Pipeline sync should success.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0002. User verifies that name field must adhere to the regular expression /^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$/, then pipeline sync should pass
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0002. User verifies that name field must adhere to the regular expression /^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$/, then pipeline sync should pass

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0003. If the user adds a pipeline sources with the PowerShell step, where PowerShell step name is missing, then pipeline sync should fails.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0003. If the user adds a pipeline sources with the PowerShell step, where PowerShell step name is missing, then pipeline sync should fails.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0004. If the user adds a pipeline sources where the type field of the step is PowerShell then the pipeline sync should success
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0004. If the user adds a pipeline sources where the type field of the step is PowerShell then the pipeline sync should success

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0005. If the user adds a pipeline sources with the PowerShell step, where execution and onExecute are mentioned then Pipeline sync should success
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0005. If the user adds a pipeline sources with the PowerShell step, where execution and onExecute are mentioned then Pipeline sync should success

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0006. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where execution is mentioned and onExecute field is not mentioned then pipeline sync should fails..
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0006. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where execution is mentioned and onExecute field is not mentioned then pipeline sync should fails..

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0013. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell steps, where disconnected steps are specified in the same affinity group then Pipeline sync fails
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0013. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell steps, where disconnected steps are specified in the same affinity group then Pipeline sync fails

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0014. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell steps, where the steps are in the same affinity group, but if different node pools are specified, Pipeline sync should fail
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0014. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell steps, where the steps are in the same affinity group, but if different node pools are specified, Pipeline sync should fail

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0016. User verifies that affinity field must adhere to the regular expression /^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$/ by adding a pipelineSource with affinity group mentioned in the yml then pipeline sync should pass
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0016. User verifies that affinity field must adhere to the regular expression /^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$/ by adding a pipelineSource with affinity group mentioned in the yml then pipeline sync should pass

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0022. User verifies that the timeout value specified cannot be negative or a non-number then Pipeline sync should fail
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0022. User verifies that the timeout value specified cannot be negative or a non-number then Pipeline sync should fail

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0023. User verifies that the Timeout value cannot have fractions of a minute. then Pipeline sync should fail
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0023. User verifies that the Timeout value cannot have fractions of a minute. then Pipeline sync should fail

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0027. Users should be able to add integration names in the configuration -> integration section of the yaml. If that project integration is present then pipeline source should succeed
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0027. Users should be able to add integration names in the configuration -> integration section of the yaml. If that project integration is present then pipeline source should succeed

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0028. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where the mentioned integration in the YAML is not available then the pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0028. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where the mentioned integration in the YAML is not available then the pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0029. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where the integration section is found but integration name is not given then the pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0029. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where the integration section is found but integration name is not given then the pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0030. Users should be able to add one PowerShell step to another PowerShell step while giving the name of the PowerShell step in configuration -> inputSteps section of the yaml Pipeline source should succeed
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0030. Users should be able to add one PowerShell step to another PowerShell step while giving the name of the PowerShell step in configuration -> inputSteps section of the yaml Pipeline source should succeed

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0031. If a user adds a pipeline source with PowerShell steps where the mentioned step under the inputSteps section in the YAML is not found then the pipeline should fail
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0031. If a user adds a pipeline source with PowerShell steps where the mentioned step under the inputSteps section in the YAML is not found then the pipeline should fail

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0034. If a user adds a pipeline source with PowerShell steps where the runtime section is specified and if configuration->runtime-> type is not specified in the yaml then pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0034. If a user adds a pipeline source with PowerShell steps where the runtime section is specified and if configuration->runtime-> type is not specified in the yaml then pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0038. If a user adds a pipeline source with a PowerShell step where auto and custom both are specified in the yaml,then pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0038. If a user adds a pipeline source with a PowerShell step where auto and custom both are specified in the yaml,then pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0044. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where configuration->runtime->type is set to host and an image section is also specified in the yaml, then pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0044. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where configuration->runtime->type is set to host and an image section is also specified in the yaml, then pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0045.If the user adds a pipeline with PowerShell step where specified outputResource in the YAML is not found, then pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0045.If the user adds a pipeline with PowerShell step where specified outputResource in the YAML is not found, then pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0007. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where the type field is missing, then Pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0007. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where the type field is missing, then Pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0008. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where the configuration section is mentioned, then pipeline sync should success.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0008. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, where the configuration section is mentioned, then pipeline sync should success.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0015. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell steps, where the steps are in the same affinityGroup, but node pool for the steps is not available then pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0015. If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell steps, where the steps are in the same affinityGroup, but node pool for the steps is not available then pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0055.If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, on a non-windows nodePool by specifying in nodePool field under configuration section in the YAML, then pipeline sync should fail
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0055.If a user adds a pipeline source with the PowerShell step, on a non-windows nodePool by specifying in nodePool field under configuration section in the YAML, then pipeline sync should fail

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0056. If a user adds a pipeline source with the bash step, on a windows nodePool by specifying in nodePool field under configuration section in the YAML, then pipeline sync should fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0056. If a user adds a pipeline source with the bash step, on a windows nodePool by specifying in nodePool field under configuration section in the YAML, then pipeline sync should fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0011. If the user triggers a PowerShell step where the node pool is mentioned in the YAML but that node pool doesnot exist then Pipeline sync should fail
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0011. If the user triggers a PowerShell step where the node pool is mentioned in the YAML but that node pool doesnot exist then Pipeline sync should fail

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0060. If users add a command under the execution section in the PS step. If the command is enclosed with “{{ }}” then verify the pipeline sync doesnt fail.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0060. If users add a command under the execution section in the PS step. If the command is enclosed with “{{ }}” then verify the pipeline sync doesnt fail.

testcase.class: GENERIC_POWERSHELL - PowerShell Generic tests S-PS-Generic-0062. User verifies that pipeline sync is successful when newVersionOnly is true on a resource in inputResources for a PowerShell step.
testcase.classclass: S-PS-Generic-0062. User verifies that pipeline sync is successful when newVersionOnly is true on a resource in inputResources for a PowerShell step.
